features: 【Breathable】 Because baby's skin is soft, a diaper with good breathability will not cause redness, swelling or allergic reactions

【Super Soft】Rough surface tend to irritate the baby's skin, especially around the thighs and waist; This diaper is made of super soft cotton, and the diapers contain no additives/ paraben/chlorine/ fragrance/ bleach; Which will keep baby comfortable and will no skin irritation
【 Keep Dry】 This diaper will not soak the baby's bottom in urine and will keep the surface dry and comfortable after absorbing urine

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Daddy's choice accompany your baby to grow up Lock wetness away for up to 12 hours ! Excellent breathability ! Flexible fit for comfortable movement!

Question and Answer Why are your diapers so soft? Rough surface tend to irritate the baby's skin, but babies can't talk to anyone. That's why we use very soft non-woven fabric to contact the baby's skin and make the baby feel comfortable. Why are these diapers thinner? For Breathability. Polymer is added instead of some wood pulp to enhance absorption and make the diaper thinner. Which also brings more benefits for baby's movement and skin breathing. Can baby wear it day or night? Yes, Daddy's choice diapers effectively absorb fluids and restore dryness as quickly as possible, which help lock wetness away for up to 12 hours. What size do diapers go up to? we offer size 2， size3， size4， size5. Are diapers ingredients safe ? Yes，there is no additives/ paraben/chlorine/ fragrance/ bleach in production process.
Size 2, 92ct Size 3, 92ct Size 4, 76ct Size 5, 70ct How to choose a size? 12-18 lb 16-28 lb 22-37 lb 27+ lb

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: These are my new favorite diapers. I have a 6 year old I loved using a name brand on if it wasn’t from a bulk store. Wish I knew about these earlier! My now 18 month old wears these if I can get my hands on them. The flaps are large and stretchy. The leg holes have extra material to help with leaks. They’re soft. The best !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price, quality & amount! No leaks or rash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly soft and very absorbent!
reviews.reviewText: I tried these diapers out on a whim just because I wanted to try something less expensive than Pampers or Huggies. I didn't have high expectations since these were significantly cheaper, but they definitely surprised me! They are very absorbent, are very soft, and are pretty durable! They seem to be very gentle on my baby girl's sensitive bottom as well.They can still leak out the sides if your little one has a blowout, but that's not very different from any other cheaper diaper. These are significantly better than Luv's!! They are great for the price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Listen, you get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: These are ok in the even of an emergency or as backups but they are cheap, thin and don’t hold. I would not buy again. I wanted to like them. I bought 2 giant boxes for the first time purchasing these and that was a mistake. Need to up your game in the name of all the dads out there. So they will work, but you will need to change way more often so it ends up not being worth it imo, even a luvs or store brand would be way better option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m always up for trying new diapers but these are absolutely not it. They run slightly large which can be a plus. But nearly every diaper has leaked after 2 hours, or even less. I don’t experience this issue with any other brand and therefore I cannot recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no skin issues
reviews.reviewText: I love these diapers. they are so soft, my grandson doesn't scratch his legs and belly raw because being irritated by the regular commercial type diapers. They hold up well , I haven't had one wet morning or afternoon because I get busy and forget to check diapers . I really love these diapers , juts wish I could find them in something other than a 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Average diaper, loses integrity quickly
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to diapers, I've tried many. I've even tried the same brands, in different countries (and yes! They are different.) I have a 2.5 yo and a 15mo at the moment. I really would give these diapers 2.5 stars if I could, 3 stars might be a bit generous. I wouldn't buy these diapers again unless in a pinch or all the other good cheaper ones suddenly went up in price (which, hey, with prices and inflation currently could happen, aha).The Pros:-very soft, their best feature really.-solid white design, except for orange logo on front of waistband. While I actually really like diaper prints, white diapers to me feel a touch classier, feel a bit retro, and are best under thin baby blothes.-the price isn't bad (at the time of buying, .30 per size 5 diaper)The Cons:-If left on too long, these diapers really lose their integrity. Even if not full, they can come apart and all those little beads that absorb your children's liquids end up all over their bum. Or, if you pick your baby up, they might tear.-These also leak. I have to make sure to change diapers right before nap to not run the risk of the kiddos waking up wet. Which also leads to...-Not good for nighttime. Kids often wake up wet.-These diapers have the "tighter" style of waist band. The tab "arms" are not very long nor is the back overly stretchy, which makes it feel like closing these diapers takes more effort.-these diapers get the saggy crotch look after just an hour or two, even if minimally peed in.Overall, these diapers are ok for daytime, as long as you stay vigilant in changing diapers. However, I think there are diapers out there that work much better for a similar price (which saves you money because you don't have to change them as often!), or that work similarly to these, but are much cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large, which is great
reviews.reviewText: I recommend getting one size smaller than what your baby traditionally wears- awesome, because you get more diapers!They don’t appear to have as much gel, which I like environmentally- they are great daytime diapers. (I wouldn’t use them for bedtime). Great price, nice soft feel to them, and the sticky tabs hold up great.
